name: io.github.isaac-levine/forage
description: Self-improving tool discovery for AI agents. Find, install, and use new MCP servers automatically.

tools.name: forage_search
tools.description: Search for MCP servers and tools across registries. Describe what capability you need and get ranked results.

tools.name: forage_evaluate
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific package — version, downloads, README summary, install command.

tools.name: forage_install
tools.description: Install an MCP server and start it as a proxied subprocess. Tools become available immediately — no restart needed.

tools.name: forage_learn
tools.description: Write usage instructions to agent rule files (CLAUDE.md, AGENTS.md, .cursor/rules/) for cross-session persistence.

tools.name: forage_status
tools.description: List all tools that Forage has installed and is currently proxying.

tools.name: forage_uninstall
tools.description: Remove a previously installed tool. Stops the server, removes from manifest, and cleans up agent rules.
